channel.title: software on Thom Wiggers
channel.description: Recent content in software on Thom Wiggers

item.title: Time-invariant equality in assembly
item.description: For crypto code it's important that it's time-invariant, otherwise it is vulnerable to timing attacks. I've had to build this time-invariant equality test from scratch, because I couldn't find something on Google. I hope it's useful to someone else.
